document_data.caption: A maps showing Roq Island in the north quarter of Suq Bay.
document_data.name: Roq Island
document_data.mainbody: '''Roq Island''' was a small island found in the north quarter of [[Suq Bay]] in [[interior Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: Roq Island sat in the middle of a narrow portion of Suq Bay just north of [[Ruhh Island]] and equidistant from the coastal towns of [[Aib]] to the west and [[Hayyir]] to the east. The island was approximately {{SI|20|mi|k|long=yes}} wide and {{SI|15|mi|k|long=yes}} long, making it the larger of Suq Bay's two islands. The eastern half of the island was comprised of sandy dunes while the western half was lightly forested.
